entry.title: Hewlett Packard LaserJet Printer 默认登录漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Hewlett Packard LaserJet Printer 默认登录漏洞

漏洞类型： 弱口令

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： HP打印机通常默认允许无需密码的管理员访问。这种行为使得任何人都可以无需认证就以管理员身份登录，可能暴露敏感设置或功能。

产品厂商： Hewlett Packard

产品名称： LaserJet Printer

搜索语法： html:”hp/device/SignIn/Index”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/ab558b0b3f1ce27914c34405f7237f5f502ab5bf/network%2Fdefault-login%2Fhp-printer%2Fhp-printer-default-login.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

entry.title: Zimbra UnRAR Path Traversal Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Zimbra UnRAR Path Traversal Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-30333

漏洞类型： 目录穿越

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： CVE-2023-30333影响Linux/UNIX系统上的UnRAR工具，版本低于6.12。攻击者可利用此漏洞进行路径遍历，将文件写入解压目录之外的任意位置，可能导致任意代码执行。此漏洞的CVSS v3.1评分为7.5（高危），无需特权或用户交互即可利用，且已被NVD、CISA、CERT-EU和SonarSource确认存在实际攻击案例。漏洞存在于UnRAR的IsRelativeSymlinkSafe()函数中，该函数用于过滤危险路径如../，但在将路径从Windows格式转换为Unix格式之前进行检查，导致攻击者可通过插入特定格式的符号链接绕过安全检查。在Zimbra中，用于扫描电子邮件附件的Amavis工具使用unrar处理.rar文件，攻击者可附加恶意.rar文件，将JSP shell写入公共目录，如../../../../../../../../../../opt/zimbra/jetty_base/webapps/zimbra/public/shell.jsp，从而利用此漏洞。

产品厂商： Zimbra

产品名称： UnRAR

影响版本： < 6.12

来源： https://github.com/tuaandatt/CVE-2023-30333---Zimbra-UnRAR

类型： CVE-2023:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md

来源概述

CVE-2023-30333—Zimbra-UnRAR

  1. Mô tả lỗ hổng & Mức độ nghiêm trọng
    Lỗ hổng CVE-2022-30333 ảnh hưởng tới tiện ích UnRAR < 6.12 trên hệ điều
    hành Linux/UNIX. Kẻ tấn công có thể khai thác để thực hiện path traversal, ghi
    đè hoặc ghi file tùy ý ra ngoài thư mục giải nén, dẫn đến thực thi mã tùy ý.
    • CVSS v3.1: 7.5 (High)
    • Tính chất: Không yêu cầu quyền (no privileges), không cần tương tác
    người dùng (no user interaction).
    • Tình trạng: Đã có khai thác thực tế (actively exploited) – xác nhận bởi
    NVD, CISA, CERT-EU và SonarSource.
  2. Cơ chế khai thác kỹ thuật
    Lỗi nằm trong hàm IsRelativeSymlinkSafe() của UnRAR, vốn dùng để lọc các
    đường dẫn nguy hiểm như ../. Tuy nhiên, kiểm tra này diễn ra trước khi chuyển
    đổi định dạng đường dẫn từ Windows sang Unix bằng hàm DosSlashToUnix().
    → Kẻ tấn công có thể chèn symbolic link dạng ......\tmp/shell, vượt qua kiểm
    tra an toàn, và khi giải nén trên Linux, nó sẽ trở thành ../../../tmp/shell, ghi file
    ra ngoài thư mục dự kiến.
    Trong Zimbra:
    • Công cụ Amavis (dùng để quét email đính kèm) sử dụng unrar để xử lý
    file .rar.
    • Kẻ tấn công có thể đính kèm file .rar độc hại, ghi JSP shell vào thư mục
    public
    vd: ../../../../../../../../../../opt/zimbra/jetty_base/webapps/zimbra/public/shell.jsp
    Công cụ unrar không kiểm tra đầy đủ hoặc không chuẩn hóa đường dẫn trước
    khi ghi file ra đĩa.
    Demo:
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Zimbra UnRAR Path Traversal Vulnerabili

entry.title: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found in D-Link DIR-632 FW103B08
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-3gvh-jvc6-266h

CVSS 评分： 9.8

参考链接：

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-6121

  • https://github.com/xiaobor123/vul-finds/tree/main/vul-find-dir632-dlink-get_pure_content

  • https://github.com/xiaobor123/vul-finds/tree/main/vul-find-dir632-dlink-get_pure_content#poc

  • https://vuldb.com/?ctiid.312590

  • https://vuldb.com/?id.312590

  • https://vuldb.com/?submit.592574

  • https://www.dlink.com

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-3gvh-jvc6-266h

描述：

A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found in D-Link DIR-632 FW103B08. Affected by this issue is the function get_pure_content of the component HTTP POST Request Handler. The manipulation of the argument Content-Length leads to stack-based buffer overflow. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supported by the maintainer.

entry.title: Metasploit Framework DNS Spoofing Modules Exception Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Metasploit Framework DNS Spoofing Modules Exception Vulnerability

漏洞类型： 其他

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： Metasploit Framework中的bailiwicked_domain和bailiwicked_host模块在处理DNS查询时抛出异常，可能导致DNS欺骗攻击失败。此问题与DNS库的更改未正确移植到这些模块中有关。

产品厂商： Rapid7

产品名称： Metasploit Framework

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/issues/20172

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

来源概述

Both bailiwicked modules are throwing exceptions on 7b5b57a392927e8ddac9824ff1713d051de2a3ff. I’m guessing that the issue is related to DNS library changes that weren’t ported into these modules.

Steps to reproduce

I was able to trigger these exceptions without a proper-vulnerable target, just by setting the options sufficiently to run the module.

These two modules should also probably be updated to default their SRCPORT to 0 since that’s a supported value to select an port automatically.

Spotted while testing #20145.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Metasploit Framework DNS Spoofing Modul

entry.title: enum_chrome module SYSTEM权限下崩溃漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： enum_chrome module SYSTEM权限下崩溃漏洞

漏洞类型： 权限绕过

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： 在metasploit-framework的enum_chrome模块中，当以SYSTEM权限运行时会导致崩溃，并且会话处于不可用状态，直到用户执行rev2self命令恢复steal_token调用。此问题在64位的Server 2019实例上被发现，且在使用#18558的更改后出现。通过禁用token窃取和迁移逻辑可以临时解决此问题，但可能影响自动解密功能。

产品厂商： rapid7

产品名称： metasploit-framework

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/issues/18559

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

来源概述

When running the post/windows/gather/enum_chrome module, it will crash when run as NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM. I noticed this issue while making the changes in #18558. After the module fails, it should also be noted that the sessions is left in a pretty unusable state until the user runs rev2self to revert the steal_token call.

The target is a 64-bit Server 2019 instance and the changes from #18558 are loaded on my test branch.

After implementing the following quick workaround the module runs as NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM but with a warning about automatic decryption not being possible. The module also works as intended after migrating into a process running as a local admin.

Testing Output

I’m not sure why the token impersonation or automatic migration is required. But it looks like removing it causes the module work work as I would expect it to work. It should be noted that if the session is running as SYSTEM and the module migrates into a process running as a user, it won’t be able to migrate back into the SYSTEM process due to the loss of privileges. My guess is that the MIGRATE option was originally intended to be used to migrate into the explorer.exe process owned by the current non-SYSTEM user.

Further testing for edge cases should probably take place before just removing the token impersonation and migration logic.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： enum_chrome module SYSTEM权限下崩溃漏洞
